p: To calculate the bacteriological count, the granulated tissues were excised and 0.1 g of the sample was crushed, minced, and homogenized in a sterile mortar containing 10 mL of sterile saline. It was the diluted in tubes containing 9 mL of sterile saline, was cultured on plate count agar (Merck KGaA, Darmstadt, Germany), incubated at 37 °C for 48 h, calculated as CFU/g of granulation tissue (Farahpour et al. 2020; Khezri et al. 2019).
